SELECT id, path, filename, complexity, maintainability, issues_count, lines_of_code, analyzed_at
FROM php_audit_results
WHERE (complexity > {{$node["Set Alert Thresholds"].json["complexityThreshold"]}} OR issues_count > {{$node["Set Alert Thresholds"].json["issuesThreshold"]}})
AND analyzed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day'
ORDER BY complexity DESC, issues_count DESC
LIMIT 20;

parameters.query:
WITH weekly_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_files,
    AVG(complexity) AS avg_complexity,
    AVG(maintainability) AS avg_maintainability,
    SUM(CASE WHEN complexity > 15 OR issues_count > 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS high_risk_files,
    SUM(issues_count) AS total_issues
  FROM php_audit_results
  WHERE analyzed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
),
previous_week AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_files,
    AVG(complexity) AS avg_complexity,
    AVG(maintenability) AS avg_maintenability,
    SUM(CASE WHEN complexity > 15 OR issues_count > 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS high_risk_files,
    SUM(issues_count) AS total_issues
  FROM php_audit_results
  WHERE analyzed_at BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '14 days' AND NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
),
top_complex_files AS (
  SELECT 
    path, 
    filename, 
    complexity, 
    maintainability, 
    issues_count, 
    lines_of_code
  FROM php_audit_results
  WHERE analyzed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
  ORDER BY complexity DESC, issues_count DESC
  LIMIT 5
)
SELECT 
  w.total_files,
  w.avg_complexity,
  w.avg_maintainability,
  w.high_risk_files,
  w.total_issues,
  p.total_files AS prev_total_files,
  p.avg_complexity AS prev_avg_complexity,
  p.avg_maintenability AS prev_avg_maintainability,
  p.high_risk_files AS prev_high_risk_files,
  p.total_issues AS prev_total_issues,
  json_agg(t.*) AS top_files
FROM weekly_stats w
CROSS JOIN previous_week p
CROSS JOIN (SELECT * FROM top_complex_files) t
GROUP BY w.total_files, w.avg_complexity, w.avg_maintainability, w.high_risk_files, w.total_issues,
         p.total_files, p.avg_complexity, p.avg_maintenability, p.high_risk_files, p.total_issues;
